html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) -

  • AWS SAYS MANY SERVICES HAVE ALREADY RECOVERED, HOWEVER WE ARE WORKING TOWARDS FULL RECOVERY ACROSS SERVICES

  • AWS SAYS SERVICES LIKE SSO, CONNECT, API GATEWAY, ECS/FARGATE, AND EVENTBRIDGE ARE STILL EXPERIENCING IMPACT

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
